name: Settlement Cost Of Sales Secondary
description: amount of costs accrued for internal labor incurred as part of the given delivery of projects or services (such as product installation â€” not a ""ship and bill"" transaction for a physical product, per Rockwell Automation revenue recognition rules), stored as a decimal in the currency specified by the COPA Record Currency Code
All other costs are accrued in Settelement Cost Of Sales Primary.
